page.title: 08Employment - Cronton Village
page.content: {Employment,National Comparison;} Village is situated in a high unemployment area.Widnes 19.1% N.W.England 15.9%,Gt.Britain 13%.Local figure suggests 10%.Worst affected -school leavers.{Local Employment;}Few people are employed in the village.The small proportion that are,are employed in local shops,pubs or schools,on a part time basis.Majority of those employed,commute:Widnes-Chemical Industry,St.Helens-Glass Manufacture,Liverpool-Car Production and City Commerce.{Males;}Extremely diverse-include Professional, Skilled and a few semi-skilled occupations.{ {Female;}Majority of mothers do not seek employment until children have been admitted to primary school.Those employed include teachers,social workers,computer operators,amongstothers.
